name: (triethanolamine-perchlorate, sodium salt) dimer
SMLTrestrictions: G37 Group Restriction No. 37 corresponds to FCM substance No. 793,1080. Group restriction specification is expressed as triethanolamine.
Restrictions: Only to be used in rigid poly (vinyl chloride) in contact with foods included in the food category with reference number 01.01.A in table 2 of Annex III.
ExpressedAs: As the sum of triethanolamine and the hydrochloride adduct expressed as triethanolamine
